short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save99. Round online prices to whole numbers effortlessly for a smoother shopping experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to those extra cents and simplify your shopping experience with Save99 the ultimate Chrome extension that rounds prices to whole numbers!

Unrounded prices, like $99.99, create a psychological effect where you perceive them as significantly cheaper than they are. Some sellers use this tactic to make their products appear more appealing. 

With Save99 you'll enjoy the following benefits:

► Seamless Rounding: The extension automatically rounds* prices to the nearest whole number**, giving you clear and straightforward figures for your purchases.

► Streamlined Shopping: No more hassle of calculating precise amounts or dealing with decimal places. Enjoy a smooth and frustration-free shopping journey.

► Enhanced Clarity: Rounded prices make it easier to compare products and make quick 
decisions, saving you precious time during your busy day.

*If number is rounded Save99 skips this price
** If the price is tiny Save99 rounds it to the closest floating decimal

Supported websites: 
[ ] - Amazon.com
[ ] - Amazon.de
[ ] - Amazon.co.uk
[ ] - Ebay
[ ] - Walmart
